channel.title: Comments on: The Beach, Directed By Danny Boyle (20th Century Fox)

item.title: By: Jacquelin Robson
item.dc:creator: Jacquelin Robson
item.description: I think that the movie is intriging delving into the mind of someone that has been driven to maddness by this so called paradise.
item.content:encoded: I think that the movie is intriging delving into the mind of someone that has been driven to maddness by this so called paradise.
